Welcome.nopassword: Er is geen wachtwoord ingesteld voor de portemonnee. Maak alsjeblieft eerst een wachtwoord aan.
Welcome.subtitle_message: Verto is je toegangspoort tot Volentix, met Verto kun je VTX kopen, de oorspronkelijke token van het Volentix ecosysteem.
Welcome.join_message: We zijn blij dat je je bij ons hebt aangemeld.

CreateVertoPassword.fillall: Vul alsjeblieft alle bovenstaande velden in
CreateVertoPassword.onlysupport: Voorlopig ondersteunt Verto alleen de mogelijkheid om openbare sleutels toe te voegen. Om een portemonnee toe te voegen, geef je gewoon een naam, het portemonnee-adres en het Verto-wachtwoord op om je portemonnee toe te voegen.
CreateVertoPassword.createkey: Maak publieke/privé-sleutelparen voor een nieuwe portemonnee. Merk op dat ALLEEN de publieke sleutel is opgeslagen in Verto. Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het beheer, de opslag en de beveiliging van je eigen privé-sleutel.
CreateVertoPassword.choose: Kies ervoor om een portemonnee te openen door simpelweg op de naam te klikken.
CreateVertoPassword.note: OPMERKING: Verto is niet in staat om verwijderde portemonnees te herstellen.

WalletManager.used: De naam of de portemonnee is al gebruikt.
WalletManager.both: Je moet zowel een naam als de publieke sleutel voor de portemonnee opgeven.
WalletManager.cannotrecover: Verto kan de portemonnee eenmaal verwijderd niet meer herstellen. Druk nogmaals op de delete-knop om de portemonnee definitief te verwijderen.

KeepYourKeysSafe.before: Voordat je verder gaat, is het belangrijk om te weten dat je volledig verantwoordelijk bent voor het beheer, de veiligheid, de bescherming en het herstellen van je privé-sleutel. Niemand anders, ook niet de partners van het Volentix ecosysteem.
KeepYourKeysSafe.choices: You have 2 choices on persisting your private key. Both methods are designed to ensure your private key remains safe.
KeepYourKeysSafe.first: The first choice is to write your key down.
KeepYourKeysSafe.second: The second choice is to encrypt your key in a password protected  file.

SaveYourKeys.strategy: You will need to plan a strategy for the physical storage of your private key. This storage strategy should include long term thinking, including:
SaveYourKeys.physical: Physical Security: Vaults of any kind that provide the protection you are seeking. Think of somewhere you know its safe from theft as well as the elements. In some cases, you will choose a bank or lawyer. In others you may prefer to bury it in your backyard. The choice is yours.
SaveYourKeys.legacy: Legacy: Things happen. Life ends. You need to plan for the transference of your wallet to someone else. In some cases that may be a will, while in others it becomes a scavanger hunt. The choice is yours.
SaveYourKeys.agree: I agree with the Terms & Conditions
SaveYourKeys.responsible: I am entirely responsible for the security managment of my private key
SaveYourKeys.access: I understand that Volentix and/or partners never have access to my private key
SaveYourKeys.wifi: I understand WIFI will be disabled temporarily during the generation of keys

DisplayKey.understand: I understand that the private key is not stored in Verto and cannot be recovered.
DisplayKey.already: The name or the key has already been used.
DisplayKey.mustname: You must provide a name for your key.
DisplayKey.goodpen: Use a good pen that will not smudge or fade over time.
DisplayKey.goodpaper: Use good paper that will last.
DisplayKey.polaroid: If you want to take a photo, use a non-digital platform such as 35mm or Polaroid.
DisplayKey.look: Look for a warm, safe, secure, dry place such as a bank safety deposit box.
DisplayKey.provisions: Add provisions to your will on who and how the transfer of your wallet will be conducted.
DisplayKey.picture: Take a picture with your cell phone.

ChangeVertoPassword.recommended: It is recommended that you first backup the current configuration of Verto before changing the password. You can back up Verto
ChangeVertoPassword.access: Changes the password to access Verto. Once selected, all configuration is encrypted using the new password. You may want to

BackupWallet.simple: Simple tooling to back up your wallet in order to restore or open on another device. Simply
BackupWallet.directory: Select a directory to back up the wallet to.
BackupWallet.willbackup: Verto will back up the wallet with the name 'verto' + the date + '.config'

ChoosePassword.storeext: Store on an external drive, wallet, or USB key.
ChoosePassword.storeloc: Store it on your computers local drive.

RequestNativeChainAddress.err_noAddressAvailable: No address available for that chain. Please try again.
RequestNativeChainAddress.err_investor_must_wait: You must wait an hour between before requesting a new address.
RequestNativeChainAddress.second_p: 1. The address you receive is only valid for a limited period of time. As a result, any transaction you send after the allocation period may be lost. When sending transactions always make sure you still have an native chain address assigned to your wallet.
RequestNativeChainAddress.third_p: 2. You are only able to request one native chain address per hour.

NotWhitelisted.first_p: Before you are able to Get VTX, you must complete the following:
NotWhitelisted.first_p_first_point: 1. KYC with one of our trusted partners.
NotWhitelisted.first_p_second_point: 2. Associate a Verto Public Address to your KYC'd account.
NotWhitelisted.second_p: If you have already signed up for the KYC process, through the web, you can associate your wallet with this account now.
NotWhitelisted.third_p: In order to Get Vtx, it is required that you are KYC'd in order to meet regulatory compliance. Note that if you KYC through Verto your public address will be automatically be associated to your KYC account. As a result, once you are KYC approved, you will be able to Get VTX immediately.

KycAlreadyAssociated.first_p: The KYC'd account has already been allocated a Verto Public Address.
